extendedInfo.description: You are an Oakguard apprentice. One day youâll be a fully fledged Oakguard, charged with protecting the Great Oakâthe tree that gives life and power to your village. But first you must survive the Path of Pain.Put your life on the line in this beautifully designed puzzle compendium of potential pain; dodging intricately insane booby traps, navigating dangerous heights, and testing your timing to terminal intensities.**Runs beautifully on tablets**OUCHAvoid spinning blades, pitfalls, giant mallets and more in this unique puzzle-packed adventure. Guide your character with one-touch controls, choosing the perfect time to stop or go.WHAT AN ADVENTUREThis Could Hurt features four worlds, each with 10 challenging levels. Environments change as the game progresses: careful you don't slip on the Ice World, or burn up in the Lava World.A-MAZE-ING VISUALSEach level is a beautiful 3D maze filled with death-traps that you must climb, run, jump and occasionally fly through to get to the end intact!YOU HAVE THE POWERCollect the golden Acorns hidden throughout the world to unlock a variety of achievements and power-ups from shields to health and speed boosts.For more information or support, please visit www.chillingo.com

reviews.title: Lots of Entertainment!
reviews.comment: This game is creative & lots of challenging fun. Trying to get the speed bonus seems impossible, but you feel an extra sense of accomplishment once you get it.
reviews.author: Sarah Smith

reviews.comment: unable to.download.. tht sucks really wanted to see if it was as good as ppl say.. please fix asap
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pretty fun
reviews.comment: This game is somewhat fun and VERY simple. I\'ve played about 8 levels and you only press one button. You follow a path and try to avoid obstacles by stopping before you hit them. You have to time things up correctly. It got old to me, but you might like it!
reviews.author: Jonah Hatt

reviews.title: Good concept ruined by IAP.
reviews.comment: Interesting concept and looks promising.  Would have bought the game for a set price.  In-app purchases and nag screens?  Immediate uninstall.  To all you retro gamers out there this game looks and plays kind of like Congo Bongo, but on rails.
reviews.author: John Lawson

reviews.title: some what fun...
reviews.comment: after a while of playing it get uninteresting.  also i hate that connects with facebook with out asking...
reviews.author: Joe G

reviews.title: I love it!
reviews.comment: This is a fun game that takes concentration and skill. Also pretty entertaining. It does take a while to load though but when it does there are no problems.
reviews.author: Sean Evans

reviews.title: Interesting game... intrusive adverts
reviews.comment: So, this game only has one button, but the timing can be challenging. Although, I would have the intrusive advertising happen less often. It makes me wonder how much money they make, because you will get a YouTube video between every level without buying in. It\'s annoying, and I wish they would tone it down a few notches.
reviews.author: Zachare Sylvestre

reviews.title: Bad Game
reviews.comment: I just waisted 15minutes trying to figure the game. Actually u can go thru the whole level without doing anything. Bad game.
reviews.author: Mahdi Kholfi

reviews.title: Well done.
reviews.comment: The graphics in this game are top notch, some of the best I\'ve seen on Android. If you play it long enough to give it a chance you will see that this is a good game and it can be very challenging the higher the level. Honestly I\'m glad I downloaded this game, thx dev\'s.
reviews.author: Jeff Jones

reviews.title: Very fun on samsung galaxy tab
reviews.comment: This game is really cool and iT\'s sorT of like a side scroller buT wiTh a 3d look To iT. Very challenging and fun To beaT and addicTive :-) Thanks for The cool game. only thing that\'s irritating about this game is that after each level you have to look at an ad, but it\'s free so that\'s sort of expected. it\'s like TV, you want to watch the TV show you have to tolerate the commercials lol.
reviews.author: Rc C

reviews.title: Fantastic!
reviews.comment: I love this game. This is the only Android game I\'ve found so far that is truly addictive. I love the music and the graphics and the challenges. Glad I found it.
reviews.author: Randi Morgan

reviews.title: Fun game.
reviews.comment: It\'s a good game but I cant change from French to English. It\'s stuck on French and I cant read a thing.
reviews.author: Martin Tkach

reviews.title: What a great platformer!
reviews.comment: It\'s simple, easy to pick up and play.  Graphics are crisp and clean.  A game that can be played in small doses, or long sessions.   AAA+
reviews.author: Myron Adams

reviews.title: Pretty good.
reviews.comment: Fun, but not super exciting.Good if you have time to kill. The game works great.
reviews.author: Zachary Garcia

reviews.title: Ads ruin a perfect game
reviews.comment: I can understand that makers need to make money but having ads that restart the game every freaking time you beat a level is UNACCEPTABLE!! Charging us to remove this annoyance from the game shows how stingy these developers are and is also UNACCEPTABLE. Ads are fine, just find a way to not to make them restart the game.  This is honestly a five star game with a REALLY GOOD music and genius concept. but the ads ruin this experience which is why im giving it three stars until ads don\'t restart game for free.
reviews.author: Mark Tenorio

reviews.title: Boring!
reviews.comment: This game is dull and stupid. Its too simple for phones now a days. I\'d give it no stars if I could. Uninstalling.
reviews.author: Tyre salisbury

reviews.title: Really?!
reviews.comment: I just waited 5 minutes for my game to download.. then 1st of all when you set it to english its french and when set to french its English?  Secondly it says tap anywhere on. The screen to stop him running... I tapped everywhere he never stopped...
reviews.author: sarah dermick

reviews.title: Laggy and frustrating
reviews.comment: I like the idea of simple controls, but half of the times I died it was from wrestling with poor touchscreen response on my Asus Transformer. Also by level 9 I\'d been reminded about a dozen times about powerups. Nah.
reviews.author: Travis Ruetenik

reviews.title: Good game but lags
reviews.comment: My Xoom freezes when I open most of the times. Annoying. Uninstalling
reviews.author: Viktoria O\'Neal

reviews.title: Boring
reviews.comment: It could potentially be a fun game, but it isn\'t. All you do is tell the character when to stop. That\'s it. You have no other control of his movements, he follows the path himself. \"Grab the acorn\"... You just let him walk through it. Sucky game
reviews.author: Amanda Finnigan
